name: Tilt Balance
description:
Welcome!

In This Game You Must Balance A Ball On A Platform By Tilting It To Make Sure It Doesn't Fall Of Or Hit An Obstacle!

There Are Plenty Of Obstacles That Fall From The Sky (Pro Tip: Try Seeing If There Are Any Other Shadows Other Than The Ball On The Platform) Like Rockets, Rocks And Others, So Try To Move The Ball Around To Not get Hit By Them!

You Also Earn Money The Longer You Manage To Survive, Which Allows You To Buy Cool Skins At The Shop Menu! There Are Also Achievements Which You Can Get By Doing Different Things Like Getting To A Certain High Score Or Buying Skins At The Shop, So Thats Pretty Cool.

Source Code: https://github.com/GuyMakesStuff/Tilt-Balance-Source
